name: RealJoy
0:
”Alexa, open real joy”
”Alexa, ask real joy to listen live”
”Alexa, ask real joy what's playing?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: real joy
des:
Real Joy is your home for Southern Gospel Music. Enjoy today’s top gospel artists, hear stories that will build your faith, and join a community of people who share your solid, time-honored values. Broadcasting live from the heart of the South, Real Joy brings uplifting, encouraging music to Southern Gospel fans anywhere in the world.

Once you've enabled the skill, say "Alexa, open Real Joy", then follow the prompts from there.

You can also say "Alexa, ask Real Joy dot org..."
"...to listen live."

While listening to the live stream, you can hear the current song details by saying "Alexa, ask Real Joy dot org..."
"...what's playing?"
"...what song is this?"
"...who is the artist?"

For instructions on interacting with this skill, just say "help."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
